text:
Hi I'm Aleksandr.
 A middle frontend developer.
sub-text: Hello, my name is Aleksandr Chukhrai and I'm a frontend developer. I have a passion for the develop new things big or small. I also love coding and mathematics. I was born in Kherson, Ukraine and currently {{text, age}} of my age. I graduated at Kherson Technical State University with a degree in Bachelor of Science in Information Technology where I discovered my passion for problem solving with information technology. I am currently working as a freelancer. If you want to get started with your project and you need my help, fill free to contact me.
